instructions: Launch the Google Play Store on your phone Scroll down to find the Be the first to play section. Tap the arrow to expand the whole section. Here you will find all the game in open beta that are available to download. Launch the Google Play Store Scroll down to the "Be the first to play" Find the selection of beta games available to download Source: Android Central
Scroll down on an app listing in the Play Store to see if there's an option to Join the beta . Tap Join . Find the Join the beta section on an app Tap Join. Source: Android Central
